00022 function    widget
00023 purpose     create the widget
00024 parameters  p_type the type of the widget
00025             p_name     name of widget
00026             value      widget's value
00027             readonly   true or false
00028 +++*/
00029 class widget {
00030   var $type;
00031   var $name;
00032   var $value;
00033   var $readonly;
00034   var $size;
00035   var $selected;
00036   var $table;
00037   var $label;
00038   var $disabled;
00039   var $extra;
00040   var $extra2;
00041   var $tabindex;
00042   function widget($p_type="") {
00043     $this->type=$p_type;
00044     $this->readonly=false;
00045     $this->size=20;
00046     $this->width=50;
00047     $this->heigh=20;
00048     $this->value="";
00049     $this->selected="";
00050     $this->table=0;
00051     $this->label="";
00052     $this->disabled=false;
00053     $this->tabindex=32767;
00054   }
00055   function SetReadOnly($p_read) {
00056     $this->readonly=$p_read;
00057   }
00058   /*  function IOValue($p_name,$p_value="",$p_label="") 
00059    *****************************************************
00060    *  purpose : create the corresponding INPUT tag 
00061    *        
00062    *  parameters: $p_name is the INPUT NAME
00063    *          $p_value is the INPUT VALUE or an array for select
00064    *          $p_label is the label of the INPUT
00065    *  return : string containing the tag
00066    */
00067   function IOValue($p_name=null,$p_value=null,$p_label="") {
00068     
00069     if ( $p_name != null)
00070       $this->name=$p_name;
00071     $this->value=($p_value===null)?$this->value:$p_value;
00072     $this->label=($p_label == "")?$this->label:$p_label;
00073     
00074     // Input text type
00075     $disabled = $this->disabled ? "DISABLED" : "";
00076     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="TEXT") {
00077       if ( $this->readonly==false) {
00078         $r="<INPUT TYPE=\"TEXT\" NAME=\"$this->name\" VALUE=\"$this->value\" TABINDEX=\"$this->tabindex\" SIZE=\"$this->size\" ".$disabled.">";} else {
00079             $r=sprintf('<span>%s</span><input type="hidden" name="%s" value="%s">', $this->value,$this->name,$this->value);
00080         }
00081         
00082       if ($this->table==1) {
00083         if ( $this->label != "") {
00084           $r="<TD>".$this->label."</TD><TD>".$r."</TD>";
00085         }else {
00086           $r="<TD>".$r."</TD>";
00087         }
00088       }
00089       return $r;
00090     }
00091     // Hidden field
00092     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="HIDDEN") {
00093       $r='<INPUT TYPE="HIDDEN" name="'.$this->name.'" value="'.$this->value.'">';
00094       if ( $this->readonly==true) return "";
00095       return $r;
00096     }
00097     // Select value
00098     if ( strtoupper($this->type) == "SELECT") {
00099       if ($this->readonly==false ){
00100               //echo "<b>Selected <b>".$this->selected;
00101       $r="<SELECT NAME=\"$this->name\">";
00102       for ( $i=0;$i<sizeof($this->value);$i++) {
00103         $checked=($this->selected==$this->value[$i]['value'])?"SELECTED":"";
00104         $r.='<OPTION VALUE="'.$this->value[$i]['value'].'" '.$checked.'>';
00105         $r.=$this->value[$i]['label'];
00106       }
00107       $r.="</SELECT>";
00108       } else {
00109         echo_debug('class_widget.php',__LINE__,"this->selected = ".$this->selected); 
00110         for ( $i=0;$i<sizeof($this->value);$i++) {
00111           echo_debug('class_widget.php',__LINE__,"check for ".$this->value[$i]['value']);
00112           if ($this->selected==$this->value[$i]['value'] ) {
00113             $r=$this->value[$i]['label'];
00114         
00115           }
00116         }
00117       }
00118       if ( $this->table==1) {
00119         $r="<TD> $r </TD>";
00120         if ( $this->label != "") $r="<TD> $this->label</TD>".$r;
00121       }
00122       return $r;
00123     }
00124     // Password
00125     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="PASSWORD") {
00126       if ( $this->readonly==true) return "";
00127       $r='<input type="password" name="'.$this->name;
00128       $r.='">';
00129       if ($this->table==1) {
00130         $r="<TD> $this->label </TD><TD> $r </TD>";
00131       }
00132       return $r;
00133     }
00134 
00135     // Checkbox
00136     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="CHECKBOX") {
00137       if ( $this->readonly == true) {
00138         $check=( $this->selected==true )?"checked":"unchecked";
00139         $r='<input type="CHECKBOX" name="'.$this->name.'"';
00140         $r.="  $check";
00141         $r.=' disabled>';
00142 
00143       } else {
00144         $check=( $this->selected==true )?"checked":"unchecked";
00145         $r='<input type="CHECKBOX" name="'.$this->name.'"';
00146         $r.="  $check";
00147         $r.=' '.$disabled.'>';
00148       }
00149       if ($this->table==1) {
00150         $r="<TD> $this->label </TD><TD> $r </TD>";
00151       } else {
00152         $r=$r." $this->label";
00153       }
00154       return $r;
00155     }
00156 
00157     //radio
00158     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="RADIO") {
00159       if ( $this->readonly == true) {
00160         $check=( $this->selected==true || $this->selected=='t' )?"Yes":"no";
00161         $r=$check;
00162       } else {
00163         $check=( $this->selected==true||$this->selected=='t' )?"checked":"unchecked";
00164         $r='<input type="RADIO" name="'.$this->name.'"';
00165         $r.=" VALUE=\"$this->value\"";
00166         $r.="  $check";
00167         $r.=' '.$disabled.'>';
00168       }
00169       if ($this->table==1) {
00170         $r="<TD> $this->label </TD><TD> $r </TD>";
00171       } else {
00172         $r=$this->label.$r;
00173       }
00174       return $r;
00175     }
00176 
00177     //textarea
00178     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="TEXTAREA") {
00179       if ( $this->readonly == false ) {
00180         $r='<TEXTAREA name="'.$this->name.'"';
00181         $r.=" rows=\"$this->heigh\" ";
00182         $r.=" cols=\"$this->width\" ";
00183         $r.=' '.$disabled.'>';
00184         $r.=$this->value;
00185 
00186         $r.="</TEXTAREA>";
00187       } else {
00188         $r='<p>';
00189         $r.=$this->value;
00190         $r.='</p>';
00191       }
00192       if ($this->table==1) {
00193         $r="<TD> $this->label </TD><TD> $r </TD>";
00194       }
00195       return $r;
00196     }
00197 
00198     //file
00199     if (strtoupper($this->type)=="FILE") {
00200       if ( $this->readonly == false ) {
00201         $r='<INPUT TYPE="file" name="'.$this->name.'" VALUE="'.$this->value.'">';
00202 
00203       }
00204       if ( $this->table==1) $r="<TD>$this->label</TD><TD>$r</TD>"; 
00205       return $r;
00206     }
00207   // input type == js_search_poste => button search for the account
00208     if ( strtolower($this->type)=="js_search_poste") {
00209      
00210       $l_sessid=$_REQUEST['PHPSESSID'];
00211       if ( $this->readonly == false ) {
00212       // Do we need to filter ??
00213       if ( $this->extra2 == null ) {
00214       $r=sprintf('<TD>
00215          <INPUT TYPE="button" onClick=SearchPoste(\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\') value="Search">
00216             %s</TD><TD> 
00217 
00218              <INPUT TYPE="Text" NAME="%s" VALUE="%s" SIZE="8">
00219                  </TD>',
00220                  $l_sessid,
00221                  $this->name,
00222                  $this->extra,
00223                  $this->label,
00224                  $this->name,
00225                  $this->value 
00226                  );
00227 
00228     } else { // $p_list is not null, so we have a filter
00229       $r=sprintf('<TD>
00230          <INPUT TYPE="button" onClick=SearchPosteFilter(\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\') value="Search">
00231             %s</TD><TD> 
00232 
00233              <INPUT TYPE="Text" NAME="%s" VALUE="%s" SIZE="8">
00234                  </TD>',
00235                  $l_sessid,
00236                  $this->name,
00237                  $this->extra2,
00238                  $this->extra,
00239                  $this->label,
00240                  $this->name,
00241                  $this->value 
00242                  );
00243 
00244       } //else
00245       } else {
00246       $r=sprintf('<TD><input type="hidden" name="%s" value="%s">
00247                   %s
00248 
00249                  </TD>',
00250                  $this->name, 
00251                  $this->value ,
00252                  $this->value 
00253                  );
00254 
00255       } //else if readonly == true
00256       return $r;
00257 
00258     } // end js_search_poste
00259 
00260   // input type == js_search => button search for card
00261   if ( strtolower($this->type)=="js_search") {
00262     $l_sessid=$_REQUEST['PHPSESSID'];
00263     if  ( $this->readonly == false ) {
00264       $r=sprintf('<TD>
00265          <INPUT TYPE="button" onClick=NewCard(\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\') value="New">
00266          <INPUT TYPE="button" onClick=SearchCard(\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\',\'%s\') value="Search">
00267             %s</TD><TD> <INPUT TYPE="Text" NAME="%s" VALUE="%s" SIZE="8" TABINDEX="%s">
00268                  ',
00269                $l_sessid,
00270                $this->extra, // deb or cred
00271                $this->name,
00272                $this->extra2, //jrn
00273                $l_sessid,
00274                $this->extra,
00275                $this->name,
00276                $this->extra2,
00277                $this->label,
00278                $this->name,
00279                $this->value, 
00280          $this->tabindex
00281                );
00282     } else {
00283       // readonly == true
00284       $r=sprintf('<TD>            %s</TD>
00285                  <TD> 
00286                  <INPUT TYPE="hidden" NAME="%s" VALUE="%s" SIZE="8">
00287                  </TD>',
00288                $this->label,
00289                $this->name,
00290                $this->value 
00291                  );
00292 
00293     }
00294     return $r;
00295   }// poste==js_search
00296   // type=span
00297   if ( strtolower($this->type)=="span") {
00298     $r=sprintf('<span id="%s">%s</span>',
00299                $this->name,
00300                $this->value);
00301     return $r;
00302   }// end type = span
00303 
00304    // input type == js_tva
00305    if ( strtolower($this->type)=="js_tva") {
00306      $id=sprintf("<span id=%s></span>",$this->label);
00307         $r=sprintf('%s<TD> <INPUT TYPE="Text" NAME="%s" VALUE="%s" SIZE="3" onChange="ChangeTVA(\'%s\',\'%s\');">',
00308                   $id,
00309                $this->name,
00310                $this->value,
00311                $this->label,
00312                $this->name);
00313      $l_sessid=$_REQUEST['PHPSESSID'];
00314      $r.=sprintf("<input type=\"button\" value=\"Tva\" 
00315         onClick=\"
00316                            ShowTva('%s','%s');\"></TD>",
00317                 $l_sessid,$this->name);
00318      return $r;
00319    }
00320 
00321   // input type == js_concerned => button search for the concerned operations
00322   if ( strtolower($this->type)=="js_concerned") {
00323     if ( $this->readonly == false) {
00324       $l_sessid=$_REQUEST['PHPSESSID'];
00325       $r=sprintf('<TD>
00326          <INPUT TYPE="button" onClick=SearchJrn(\'%s\',\'%s\') value="Search">
00327             %s</TD><TD> 
00328 
00329              <INPUT TYPE="Text" NAME="%s" VALUE="%s" SIZE="8">
00330                  </TD>',
00331                  $l_sessid,
00332                  $this->name,
00333                  $this->label,
00334                  $this->name,
00335                  $this->value 
00336                  );
00337     } else {
00338       $r=sprintf("<TD><span>%s</span>",$this->value);
00339       $r.=sprintf('<input type="hidden" name="%s" value="%s"></TD>', $this->name,$this->value);
00340     }
00341 
00342     return $r;
00343   }// end js_concerned
00344   return "INVALID WIDGET ";
00345   } //end function
00346   /* Debug
00347    */
00348   function debug() {
00349     echo "Type ".$this->type."<br>";
00350     echo "name ".$this->name."<br>";
00351     echo "value". $this->value."<br>";
00352     $readonly=($this->readonly==false)?"false":"true";
00353     echo "read only".$readonly."<br>";
00354   }
00355   function Submit ($p_name,$p_value) {
00356     return '<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" NAME="'.$p_name.'" VALUE="'.$p_value.'">';
00357   }
00358   function Reset ($p_value) {
00359     return '<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT"  VALUE="'.$p_value.'">';
00360   }
